title: Annie Hall
creator_credit: Woody Allen, Charles H. Joffe and United Artists Corporation
brief_description: Woody Allen’s satire on the comic anxiety between the sexes in contemporary relationships. When Alvy Singer (Woody Allen), a neurotic night-club comedian, meets Annie Hall (Diane Keaton), a budding cabaret singer, a nervous romance begins. Also stars Colleen Dewhurst
creator_credit_for_label: Woody Allen, Charles H. Joffe and United Artists Corporation
